code: import{LOGIN_USER,LOGIN_USER_SUCCESS,LOGIN_USER_FAILED,LOGOUT_USER,REGISTER_USER,REGISTER_USER_SUCCESS,REGISTER_USER_FAILED,FORGET_PASSWORD,FORGET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS,FORGET_PASSWORD_FAILED}from'./constants';export var loginUser=function loginUser(username,password){return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:{username,password}};};export var loginUserSuccess=function loginUserSuccess(user){return{type:LOGIN_USER_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var loginUserFailed=function loginUserFailed(error){return{type:LOGIN_USER_FAILED,payload:error};};export var registerUser=function registerUser(fullname,email,password){return{type:REGISTER_USER,payload:{fullname,email,password}};};export var registerUserSuccess=function registerUserSuccess(user){return{type:REGISTER_USER_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var registerUserFailed=function registerUserFailed(error){return{type:REGISTER_USER_FAILED,payload:error};};export var logoutUser=function logoutUser(history){return{type:LOGOUT_USER,payload:{history}};};export var forgetPassword=function forgetPassword(username){return{type:FORGET_PASSWORD,payload:{username}};};export var forgetPasswordSuccess=function forgetPasswordSuccess(passwordResetStatus){return{type:FORGET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS,payload:passwordResetStatus};};export var forgetPasswordFailed=function forgetPasswordFailed(error){return{type:FORGET_PASSWORD_FAILED,payload:error};};
